title: Simulate SNP pattern
text: Randomly place fixed number mutations given genealogy without recombination. Save SNP patterns VCF file: can also generate list SNP data.frame chromosomes recombination parallel. Use RNGkind("L'Ecuyer-CMRG") set.seed() reproducibility:

title: Individual-based simulator of pacific bluefin tuna
text: Unix-like OS (macOS, Linux, etc.) C++17 compiler (clang++ >= Apple LLVM 12, g++ >= 8) CMake (>= 3.15.0)

title: Individual-based simulator of pacific bluefin tuna
text: code tries find use installed tekka system. old found, latest version installed. use bleeding edge (HEAD) specific revision, set environment variable TEKKA_GIT_TAG installation: installation tekka tekkamaki can checked following commands: Please include information report issues.
code: # install.packages("pak") pak::pkg_install("heavywatal/tekkamaki") Sys.setenv(TEKKA_GIT_TAG = "HEAD") tekkamaki::tekka_path() tekkamaki::tekka_version() sessioninfo::session_info("tekkamaki")

title: Functions to generate gene genealogy from sample family table — make_gene_genealogy
text: gather_segments() transforms individual-based sample_family segment-based table. count_uncoalesced() counts uncoalesced roots samples. annotate_sampled() adds "sampled" edge attribute: TRUE sampled, FALSE upstream samples, NA unrelated.

title: Read functions — read_result
text: Read functions

title: Read functions — read_result
text: file Either path file, connection, literal data (either single string raw vector). Files ending .gz, .bz2, .xz, .zip automatically uncompressed. Files starting http://, https://, ftp://, ftps:// automatically downloaded. Remote gz files can also automatically downloaded decompressed. Literal data useful examples tests. recognised literal data, input must either wrapped (), string containing least one new line, vector containing least one string new line. Using value clipboard() read system clipboard.

title: Read functions — read_result
text: read_result reads result tekka.

title: Functions to generate SNPs on given samples. — make_snp
code: make_snp(samples, ss)  make_snp_chromosome(genealogy, segsites)  place_mutations(genealogy, segsites, v_sampled = NULL)

title: Functions to generate SNPs on given samples. — make_snp
text: samples data.frame: sample_family output gather_segments(). ss sequence segsites; length number chromosome; element number segsites chromosome. named vector given, output also named. genealogy output make_gene_genealogy(). segsites number segregating sites segment. v_sampled sampled vertices. Use fix output order.

title: Functions to generate SNPs on given samples. — make_snp
text: make_snp() generates list SNP data.frames calling make_snp_chromosome() parallel. Use RNGkind("L'Ecuyer-CMRG") set.seed() get reproducible results. number CPU cores used can configured via mc.cores option. make_snp_chromosome() simulate SNP data.frame chromosome calling place_mutations() recombination(). place_mutations() generates SNP data.frame randomly placing fixed number mutations given genealogy. means sites perfectly linked .

title: Run C++ simulation. — tekka
text: result first written directory cache, read data.frame. previous result exactly arguments found cache, read without calling tekka.

title: Run C++ simulation. — tekka
text: args Command line arguments string vector. random --seed appended given. Use set.seed() --seed explicitly reproducibility caching. cache Parent directory tekka output. tempdir() used default (FALSE), discarded end R session. TRUE equivalent "." (current directory).
